إذا كان لديك أي استفسارات أو احتياجات إضافية، فلا تتردد في الاتصال بنا. نتمنى لك الشفاء العاجل.

வணக்கம்,

உங்கள் அனுபவத்தைப் பற்றி எங்களுக்குத் தெரிவித்திருக்கிறீர்கள், அதற்கு நன்றி. உங்கள் ஆரோக்கியத்தில் நம்பிக்கை வைத்திருக்கிறோம். Symbicort மருந்து உங்களுக்கு பொருத்தமாக இல்லை என்று உணர்ந்திருக்கிறீர்கள் என்பது கவலைக்குரியது. உங்கள் ஆரோக்கியத்திற்கு மிகவும் முக்கியமானது, எனவே உங்கள் மருத்துவருடன் உடனடியாக பேசி, மாற்று சிகிச்சை வழிகளைப் பற்றி விவாதிக்க அறிவுறுத்துகிறேன். உங்கள் ஆரோக்கியத்திற்கு சிறந்த சிகிச்சையைக் கண்டறிய உதவுவோம்.

நன்றி,
[உங்கள் பெயர்]

FEEDBACK: Δυστυχώς, το Seroquel δεν ήταν κατάλληλο για τη θεραπεία της bipolar disorder μου. Η συμμόρφωσή μου ήταν moderate αλλά το αποτέλεσμα ήταν κακό. I experienced some concerning side effects. Χρειάζομαι εναλλακτική θεραπεία.
DIAGNOSIS: Patient Diagnosed With Bipolar Disorder And Prescribed Seroquel For Treatment.
T_FEEDBACK: Unfortunately, Seroquel was not right for my bipolar disorder. My compliance was moderate but the outcome was poor. I experienced some concerning side effects. I need an alternative treatment.
REPLY: Ευχαριστώ πολύ για την ανατροφοδότησή σας. Καταλαβαίνω ότι το Seroquel δεν ήταν η κατάλληλη θεραπεία για την διπολική διαταραχή σας και ότι αντιμετώπισατε κάποιες ανησυχητικές παρενέργειες. Είναι σημαντικό να βρούμε μια εναλλακτική θεραπεία που θα είναι πιο αποτελεσματική και ανεκτή για εσάς. Θα συζητήσουμε τις επιλογές σας κατά την επόμενη συνάντησή μας και θα εργαστούμε μαζί για να βρούμε την κατάλληλη λύση. Σας ευχαριστώ για την υπομονή και την εμπιστοσύνη σας.

FEEDBACK: Jag är nöjd med Calquence för att behandla min chronic lymphocytic leukemia (cll). Medicinen fungerade bra med low adherens. I experienced minimal side effects. Sammantaget är jag nöjd med resultaten.
DIAGNOSIS: Patient Diagnosed With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (Cll) And Prescribed Calquence For Treatment.
T_FEEDBACK: I am pleased with the Calquence for my chronic lymphocytic leukemia (cll). The medicine worked well with low adherence. I experienced minimal side effects. Overall, I am pleased with the results.
REPLY: Tack så mycket för din återkoppling. Jag är glad att höra att Calquence fungerar bra för dig och att du upplever minimala biverkningar. Det är viktigt att fortsätta följa din behandlingsplan och hålla kontakt med din läkare för regelbundna uppföljningar. Om du har några frågor eller oroar, tveka inte att kontakta mig. Fortsätt ta hand om dig själv och håll dig frisk!

FEEDBACK: Unfortunately, Nexium was not suitable for treating my gastroesophageal reflux disease (gerd). My adherence was moderate but the outcome was poor. I experienced some concerning side effects. I need an alternative treatment.

T_FEEDBACK: Unfortunately, Nexium was not suitable for treating my gastroesophageal reflux disease (gerd). My adherence was moderate but the outcome was poor. I experienced some concerning side effects. I need an alternative treatment.
REPLY:
Dear [Patient's Name],

Thank you for sharing your experience with Nexium and for your open communication about the challenges you've faced in managing your gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). I'm sorry to hear that the medication did not provide the relief you were seeking and that you experienced some concerning side effects.

I appreciate your efforts in adhering to the treatment plan, and I understand that the outcome was not as expected. It's important to note that each individual responds differently to medications, and it's not uncommon to need to try alternative treatments to find the most suitable one.

I would recommend scheduling a follow-up appointment so that we can discuss other treatment options that may be more effective and better tolerated. In the meantime, please continue to monitor your symptoms and contact us if you have any immediate concerns.

Thank you once again for your feedback, and I look forward to working together to find a more suitable treatment plan for you.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]

FEEDBACK: Sfortunatamente, Tagrisso non era adatto per trattare la mia non-small cell lung cancer (nsclc). La mia aderenza era low ma il risultato è stato scarso. I experienced some concerning side effects. Ho bisogno di un trattamento alternativo.
DIAGNOSIS: Patient Diagnosed With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (Nsclc) And Prescribed Tagrisso For Treatment.
T_FEEDBACK: Unfortunately, Tagrisso was not suitable for treating my non-small cell lung cancer (nsclc). My adherence was low but the result was poor. I experienced some concerning side effects. I need an alternative treatment.
REPLY:
Gentile paziente,

La ringrazio per aver condiviso il suo feedback. Mi dispiace molto che Tagrisso non sia stato efficace per il trattamento del suo carcinoma polmonare non a piccole cellule (NSCLC). Capisco che l'aderenza al trattamento possa essere difficile, specialmente quando si verificano effetti collaterali preoccupanti.

È importante che discutiamo le opzioni alternative per il suo trattamento. La invito a fissare un appuntamento per valutare insieme le possibili terapie alternative che possano essere più adatte alle sue esigenze.

Resto a sua disposizione per qualsiasi domanda o preoccupazione.

Cordiali saluti,

[Il suo nome]
